typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		clienteID as integer,
		nome as string,
		endereco as string,
		cidade as string,
		estado as string,
		sexo as string,
		renda as decimal(12,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(equals(estado,'SP')) ~> Filter1
